Q4FY25 Financial Results:A Board meeting was scheduled for May 12, 2025, to consider and approve the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025.

Expansion Plans:The company is implementing an investment plan of approximately Rs. 750 crore (around $90.5 million) for setting up an agro-chemical plant in Dahej, Gujarat and a BOPP film manufacturing facility in Indore,according to The Economic Times.

Agrochemical Facility Commissioned:SRF Limited completed the ₹239 Crore Agrochemical Facility in Dahej on April 10, 2025.

Competition and Growth:The company faces competition from China amidst its ambitious growth plans.

Belting Fabric Expansion Project Commissioned:SRF Limited successfully completed the ₹178 Crore Belting Fabric Expansion Project on March 31, 2025.

Information available suggests the latest news and updates regarding SRF Ltd. (a chemical-based multi-business entity) as on May 1, 2025, primarily revolves around the upcoming announcement of its financial results.

Note: Further updates regarding the Q4FY25 financial results would have been announced later in May, following the board meeting scheduled for May 12, 2025.
